name: Yizhou Zhang 0001
content: Yizhou Zhang Yizhou Zhang Assistant Professor Cheriton School of Computer Science, University of Waterloo I design and implement programming languages. I aim for programming models and language abstractions that offer rich expressive power, fast implementations, and strong guarantees. I invite broad-minded, technically strong students (PhD and undergraduate) to join me in exploring fun ideas in PL and beyond.
